CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Toggle off for manual control of the fluid growth.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_growth

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Manually control rate of growth
CONTROLS.NAME: manual_growth

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Reset simulation
CONTROLS.NAME: reset

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Enable flashing arc pattern to chop up simulation.
CONTROLS.NAME: disrupt_field

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: This runs the simulation twice per frame. Turn it off for a slower simulation that is easier on your GPU.
CONTROLS.NAME: run_twice_fps

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Shifts the simulation between a smoke effect and finger like patterns
CONTROLS.NAME: meltyDetail

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scatter the simulation to add extra turbulence.
CONTROLS.NAME: scatter

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Increases the texture size, resulting in faster movement.
CONTROLS.NAME: size_modifier

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Increase to add smaller details to the scene, decrease to make larger details.
CONTROLS.NAME: curl_scale

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: 50% is default no zooming. Move up to zoom in, down to zoom out.
CONTROLS.NAME: zooming

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Select from 3 color palettes
CONTROLS.NAME: color_palette

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn on for auto-rotating color palette
CONTROLS.NAME: color_rotate

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: When on, automatically pulses the logo/media
CONTROLS.NAME: light_pos

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: 100% is full opacity for the media effect, 0% is just the normal simulation, no media.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_color_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Affects how much the video is refracted by the simulation.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_refraction

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: When off, ignores the underlying 'color palette' and just uses the media. When on, multiplies the two.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_multiply

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Pulse the media to add it to the feedback field
CONTROLS.NAME: media_pulse

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: When on, automatically pulses the logo/media
CONTROLS.NAME: media_pulse_auto

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add the media to the field in a different, more subtle way
CONTROLS.NAME: media_hint

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Toggle to add audio reactive tracers that dart around the scene.
CONTROLS.NAME: Tracers_on

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Affects the speed of tracers when enabled.
CONTROLS.NAME: tracer_intensity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Affects the size of tracers when enabled.
CONTROLS.NAME: tracer_size

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Affects the position of tracers when enabled.
CONTROLS.NAME: tracer_control

DESCRIPTION: Fake fluid dynamical system that creates viscous-fingering-like flow patterns, and suturing patterns along boundaries. Original by cornusammonis from shadertoy
TITLE: Turbo Encabulator Fluid_dup
